ps2.6:4.1: Idaṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, dukkhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ.
ps2.6:4.2: Jātipi dukkhā, jarāpi dukkhā, byādhipi dukkho, maraṇampi dukkhaṁ, appiyehi sampayogo dukkho, piyehi vippayogo dukkho, yampicchaṁ na labhati tampi dukkhaṁ;

ps2.6:60.1: “‘Samudayo samudayo’ti kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:60.3: ‘Nirodho nirodho’ti kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:60.5: Vipassissa bodhisattassa veyyākaraṇe dasa dhammā, dasa atthā, vīsati niruttiyo, cattālīsaṁ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:61.5: kassapassa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:61.7: ‘Nirodho nirodho’ti kho, bhikkhave, kassapassa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:61.9: Kassapassa bodhisattassa veyyākaraṇe dasa dhammā, dasa atthā, vīsati niruttiyo, cattālīsaṁ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:62.1: “‘Samudayo samudayo’ti kho, bhikkhave, gotamassa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:62.3: ‘Nirodho nirodho’ti kho, bhikkhave, gotamassa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṁ udapādi …pe…
ps2.6:62.5: Gotamassa bodhisattassa veyyākaraṇe dasa dhammā, dasa atthā, vīsati niruttiyo, cattālīsaṁ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:63.1: Sattannaṁ bodhisattānaṁ sattasu veyyākaraṇesu sattati dhammā, sattati atthā, cattālīsasataṁ niruttiyo, asīti ca dve ca ñāṇasatāni.
ps2.6:64.1: “‘Yāvatā abhiññāya abhiññaṭṭho ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:64.3: cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:64.4: Abhiññāya abhiññaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṁ niruttiyo, sataṁ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:65.4: yāvatā sacchikiriyāya sacchikiriyaṭṭho ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:65.6: cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:65.7: Sacchikiriyāya sacchikiriyaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṁ niruttiyo, sataṁ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:66.1: Abhiññāya abhiññaṭṭhe, pariññāya pariññaṭṭhe, pahānāya pahānaṭṭhe, bhāvanāya bhāvanaṭṭhe, sacchikiriyāya sacchikiriyaṭṭhe pañcavīsasataṁ dhammā, pañcavīsasataṁ atthā, aḍḍhateyyāni niruttisatāni, pañca ñāṇasatāni.
ps2.6:67.1: “‘Yāvatā khandhānaṁ khandhaṭṭho, ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:67.3: cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:67.4: Khandhānaṁ khandhaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṁ niruttiyo, sataṁ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:68.4: yāvatā asaṅkhatassa asaṅkhataṭṭho ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:68.8: Asaṅkhatassa asaṅkhataṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṁ niruttiyo, sataṁ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:69.1: Khandhānaṁ khandhaṭṭhe, dhātūnaṁ dhātuṭṭhe, āyatanānaṁ āyatanaṭṭhe saṅkhatānaṁ saṅkhataṭṭhe, asaṅkhatassa asaṅkhataṭṭhe pañcavīsatisataṁ dhammā, pañcavīsatisataṁ atthā, aḍḍhateyyāni niruttisatāni, pañca ñāṇasatāni.
ps2.6:70.1: “‘Yāvatā dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭho, ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:70.3: cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:70.4: Dukkhassa dukkhaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṁ niruttiyo, sataṁ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:71.3: yāvatā maggassa maggaṭṭho ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:71.7: Maggassa maggaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṁ niruttiyo, sataṁ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:72.1: Catūsu ariyasaccesu sataṁ dhammā, sataṁ atthā, dve niruttisatāni, cattāri ñāṇasatāni.
ps2.6:73.1: “‘Yāvatā atthapaṭisambhidāya atthapaṭisambhidaṭṭho, ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:73.5: Atthapaṭisambhidāya atthapaṭisambhidaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṁ niruttiyo, sataṁ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:74.3: yāvatā paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya paṭibhānapaṭisambhidaṭṭho, ñāto diṭṭho vidito sacchikato phassito paññāya.
ps2.6:74.7: Paṭibhānapaṭisambhidaṭṭhe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṁ niruttiyo, sataṁ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:75.1: Catūsu paṭisambhidāsu sataṁ dhammā, sataṁ atthā, dve niruttisatāni, cattāri ñāṇasatāni.
ps2.6:76.1: “‘Yāvatā indriyaparopariyattañāṇaṁ, ñātaṁ diṭṭhaṁ viditaṁ sacchikataṁ phassitaṁ paññāya.
ps2.6:76.5: Indriyaparopariyattañāṇe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṁ niruttiyo, sataṁ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:77.5: yāvatā anāvaraṇaṁ ñāṇaṁ, ñātaṁ diṭṭhaṁ viditaṁ sacchikataṁ phassitaṁ paññāya.
ps2.6:77.7: cakkhuṁ udapādi, ñāṇaṁ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi”.
ps2.6:77.8: Anāvaraṇe ñāṇe pañcavīsati dhammā, pañcavīsati atthā, paññāsaṁ niruttiyo, sataṁ ñāṇāni.
ps2.6:78.1: Chasu buddhadhammesu diyaḍḍhasataṁ dhammā, diyaḍḍhasataṁ atthā, tīṇi niruttisatāni, cha ñāṇasatāni.
ps2.6:79.1: Paṭisambhidādhikaraṇe aḍḍhanavadhammasatāni, aḍḍhanavaatthasatāni, niruttisahassañca satta ca niruttisatāni, tīṇi ca ñāṇasahassāni, cattāri ca ñāṇasatānīti.
